questions.question: 1.Hall effect is useful for the measurement of a semiconductor's?

answers.b: type (n-type or p-type), conductivity and temperature
answers.c: type (n-type or p-type), mobility and carrier concentration

questions.question: 2.Measurement of Hall coefficient enables the determination of:

answers.b: Mobility and concentration of charge carriers
answers.c: Fermi level and forbidden energy gap

questions.question: 3.current in the conductor, and to an applied perpendicular to the current. field?
